attributes.action: Allow heateachers more freedom on how they teach their students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think that the headteachers should decide how they teach their students. whether they tech them just what they need to know to pass their exams and nothing more or whether they should give them the information on what they want know in secondary education and then grade them on their depth and breadth of their knowledge rather than it just staying in their minds til the GCSE exams an then them not being interested in the subject any further than this.

thank you for you time

peace and love
